title: Hot for Joe
description: A Sexy Short StoryWaitress Sarah Riley has never broken a law in her life. When a financial jam has her considering the theft of a gold watch, she's horrified to realize how low she's sunk. However, there's one thing Sarah wants more than money...her hot boss Joe. He's not about to let her embark on a life of crime, and one night after closing, he decides to use every deliciously wicked form of persuasion he can think of to change her mind.
author: Lily Rede
